title: Coronavirus Updates - The White House Becomes a Hot Spot & Trump's Post-Infection P.R. Blitz
itunes:title: Coronavirus Updates - The White House Becomes a Hot Spot & Trump's Post-Infection P.R. Blitz
description:
COVID-19 runs rampant in the White House after months of reckless behavior from President Trump, and Trump stages a maskless photo op after checking out of Walter Reed.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
